1.title: Search for Grilled Meat
1.plot: Arra San Agustin's cravings for grilled meat led her to an interesting place named "Long Time Ago." This Makati-based restaurant is a franchise directly from Mainland China and specializes in Szechuan/Hunan dishes and Chinese barbecue.

2.title: Arra Takes on the Man vs Pork Challenge
2.plot: Arra San Agustin is up for another challenge but this time, she will take on the 'Man vs Pork' Challenge in 'Backwell by BBZ.' This restaurant is located in Poblacion, Makati along Rockwell Drive and it offers a variety of pork recipes. What are you waiting for? Grab your circle of friends and try this 'Putok Batok' challenge.

3.title: What Is Arra San Agustin's Verdict on Ice Cream Tempura?
3.plot: It's a sweet and fun adventure in Bonifacio Global City as Arra San Agustin tries the Ice Cream Tempura of Tendon Kohaku at the Uptown Mall, BGC, Taguig City. What exactly will it taste like?

4.title: Arra San Agustin Takes on the Spicy Malaysian Noodle Challenge
4.plot: Arra San Agustin levels up this week as she embarks on the famous 'Spicy Noodle Challenge' with a twist because the recipes that she will try are from Malaysia. Like Arra, anyone can try this new spicy noodle challenge in Goreng Goreng restaurant in Marikina City.

5.title: Arra's Search for Budget-Friendly Pulutan
5.plot: The beer is ready, but Arra San Agustin is still looking for the best and budget-friendly "pulutan" (bar chow) in Metro Manila to partner with her well-loved drink.

6.title: Arra San Agustin Tries the Exotic Food Challenge
6.plot: Arra San Agustin goes to Rise and Grind restaurant in Marikina City expecting to satisfy her steak/meat craving, not knowing she will be served non-traditional/exotic meat recipes like Kalderetang Kambing (Goat Meat Stew) and Crispy Frog. Find out her reactions in this episode of Taste MNL.

7.title: Arra Discovers Food-for-Sharing in Marikina
7.plot: Arra San Agustin goes to Marikina City to visit 'Forget Me Not' cafe and to taste its special Roast Beef Sandwich, Chiffon Lime Cake, and Nutella Cheesecake. Watch as she critiques the food and know why she feels Déjà Vu from the previous episode. Which food satisfies Arra's cravings?

8.title: Arra Tastes Popular Dishes Served in a Unique Way
8.plot: Arra San Agustin goes to Ella and the Blackbird located at Esteban Abada, Quezon City to try popular dishes served in a different and unique way. Watch how she enjoyed eating adobo pasta, berry overload, healthy kani sandwich, and frozen brazo cake.

9.title: Arra Explores the Newest Coffee House Sensation
9.plot: This Saturday, Arra San Agustin goes to Coffee Project in Taft Ave. Malate, Manila with Gil Cuerva to try its best-selling drinks, dishes, and desserts. What will be their verdict be on Coffee Project's beef tapa with egg, cinnamon bun, salted caramel cake, iced white mocha, and coffee butterscotch? Let's all find out.

10.title: Arra Tries the Tender BBQ Dishes in a Korean Buffet
10.plot: Arra San Agustin follows the Korean trend here in the Philippines as she visits Gen Korean B.B.Q. Restaurant to try their best selling barbeque dishes. Watch how enjoyed and satisfied Arra is while cooking and tasting the 28 types of meat including pork, beef, and chicken.

11.title: Arra Hunts for an Affordable Food Park in Manila
11.plot: Are you a sporty person and at the same time a heavy eater? Here's a suitable food park for you. Arra San Agustin visits the Taft Food by the Court in Libertad, Pasay City to try their unlimited samgyupsal, chicken burrito, boodle fight, and their best Filipino cuisines.

12.title: Arra Satisfies Her Steak Cravings
12.plot: Arra San Agustin and Gil Cuerva try the steak specialties of the Holy Grill which is located in Taft Ave., Malate. Arra and Gil satisfy their cravings with their tender spicy cumin ribs and rib eye steak.

13.title: Arra Enjoys the Flavors of Mediterranean Cuisine
13.plot: After a tiring day at 'The Cure' taping, Arra San Agustin invites us to join her in her food trip this afternoon. If you are a shawarma or kebab lover, you will surely enjoy Arra's gastronomic experience at Feta Mediterranean in Annapolis, Greenshills. Are you ready for our Greek feast? Let's all test the flavor of the Beyti Kebap, Iskender Kebap, and Keftedes.
